deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

deleteAccountModal.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountModal.warning: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountModal.ownedGroupsMessage: You own the following groups. Ownership will be transferred to the oldest member:

deletedItems.personalStatistics: Your personal statistics and listening data

preservedItems.groupCharts: Group charts and historical statistics (your contributions remain but are anonymized)
preservedItems.groupsYouCreated: Groups you created (ownership transferred if you own them)

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Pin a group to your navbar for quick access! Visit any group page and click the
quickAccess.descriptionEnd: button in the header area to add it here.
quickAccess.description2: Once added, the group will appear in your navbar, making it easy to jump to your favorite group anytime.
quickAccess.replaceConfirm: Do you want to replace your quick access group?

personalListening.title: Your Listening This Week
personalListening.noDataDescription: Your weekly stats will appear here once your groups generate charts.

emptyState.title: Ready to get started?
emptyState.description: Join or create a group to track stats, explore trends, and build a shared history of your music listening over time.

groupsYouMightLike.title: Groups You Might Like
groupsYouMightLike.comingSoonDescription: Recommendations will be available in a future update

groupQuickView.title: Your Groups
groupQuickView.noGroups: You're not in any groups yet.

share.title: Share Group
share.description: ‚ú® Let's grow the squad! Share this group with your music-loving friends
share.invitationText: Hey! Join my music group on ChartsFM:

weeklyCharts.title: Weekly Charts
weeklyCharts.startTracking: Start tracking your group's listening habits!

public.noChartsDescription: This group hasn't generated any charts yet.

trends.title: Trends
trends.generateChartsToSee: Generate charts to see weekly trends and insights!
trends.noEntriesToShow: There are no entries to show. üçÇ
trends.topContributionsTooltip: Chart entries where you contributed the most. Shows how much of the group's total you made up for each one.
trends.entriesYouDroveTooltip: Chart entries where you contributed at least half of the group's total. You were the main reason these made it into the charts.
trends.yourBiggestMoversTooltip: Chart entries that moved up the most this week and that you helped with. Shows how many spots each one climbed.
trends.seeHowWeekPlayedOut: See how the entire week played out
trends.exploreCompleteCharts: Explore the complete charts with all artists, tracks, and albums ranked for this week.

funFacts.comeback: {type} "{name}"{byArtist} made a comeback! Returned to the top 10 after {weeks} weeks away!
funFacts.onFire: {type} "{name}"{byArtist} is on fire! {weeks} weeks in a row in the top 10!
funFacts.unstoppable: Unstoppable! "{name}"{byArtist} has been charting for {weeks} consecutive weeks
funFacts.newPeak: New peak! "{name}"{byArtist} reached #{position}, their highest ever!
funFacts.firstTimer: First timer! "{name}"{byArtist} entered the charts for the very first time!
funFacts.welcomeToClub: Welcome to the club! {count} entries are charting for the first time ever
funFacts.dominating: {artist} is dominating with {count} entries in the charts!
funFacts.steadyAsRock: Steady as a rock! {count} entries held their position this week
funFacts.top3Stable: The top 3 stayed strong - no changes at the top!
funFacts.wildWeek: This week was wild! {plays} more plays than last week - that's a {percent}% increase!
funFacts.closeRace: Close race! Top contributor only {difference} plays ahead of second place
funFacts.mvp: This week's MVP: {name} with {plays} plays - absolute legend!
funFacts.totalPlays: The group listened to {plays} songs this week - that's dedication!

allTimeStats.title: All-Time Stats
allTimeStats.generateChartsToStart: Generate charts to start building your all-time rankings!

inviteModal.title: Invite Member
inviteModal.usernameDescription: Enter the Last.fm username of the user you want to invite
inviteModal.atLimit: This group has reached the maximum limit of {max} members. You cannot invite more members.
inviteModal.accountCreatedAndAdded: Account created and added successfully for {username}!
inviteModal.accountCreatedAndInviteSent: Account created and invite sent successfully for {username}!

error.userNotFound: User with this Last.fm username not found

search.title: Search Charts
search.placeholder: Search for artists, tracks, or albums...

shoutbox.title: Shoutbox
shoutbox.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to post!
shoutbox.deleteCommentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.

chartCreation.title: Chart Settings
chartCreation.chartSizeDescription: Number of items to display in each chart (Top 10, Top 20, or Top 50)
chartCreation.chartModeDescription: How charts are calculated and ranked. Changing this only affects future charts.
chartCreation.chartModeFAQLink: To learn more about the chart modes and how VS is calculated, <link>check the FAQ page</link> ‚Üí
chartCreation.trackingDayOfWeekDescription: The day of the week that marks the start of each tracking period. Each week runs from this day through the day before the next occurrence (e.g., if set to Sunday, weeks run from Sunday to Saturday). Charts can be calculated after each week ends, and this can be done on the day selected below.

vs.label: Vibe Score (VS)
vs.description: ‚ú® Recommended! Every member's top picks get equal love. Your #1 track scores 2.00 VS, and scores decrease gradually for lower positions. We sum everyone's scores together. Perfect for groups where everyone's taste matters equally!

vsWeighted.label: VS Weighted
vsWeighted.description: The best of both worlds! We multiply your VS (calculated from your top 100) by how many times you actually played it, then sum across all members. Great for balancing what's important to you with how much you listened.

playsOnly.label: Plays Only
playsOnly.description: Classic and simple! Just add up all the play counts. If you want the traditional "most played wins" approach, this is your jam.

groupDetails.privateGroupDescription: Private groups are not viewable publicly and require approval to join
groupDetails.usersCanJoinFreelyDescription: When enabled, users can join this group directly from the public page without requiring approval
groupDetails.dynamicIconDescription: Automatically update the group icon based on the latest weekly chart. The icon will update whenever new charts are generated.
groupDetails.iconSourceDescription: Choose what the group icon should display from the latest weekly chart
groupDetails.tagsDescription: Add up to 10 tags to describe your group's music taste.

styling.title: Styling Settings
styling.colorThemeDescription: Choose a color theme for your group page. This will apply to backgrounds, text, buttons, and highlights throughout the page.

regenerateCharts.title: Regenerate Charts
regenerateCharts.fetchingData: Fetching data from last.fm. This may take a few minutes...
regenerateCharts.description: This will connect to Last.fm and regenerate chart data for the last {weeks} weeks using your group's current configuration. The charts from the last {weeks} weeks will be overwritten and replaced. Use this when you want to recalculate past charts with updated group membership ‚Äî for example, if someone recently joined and you'd like to see how the historical charts would look with their listening data included.
regenerateCharts.weeksToGenerate: Number of weeks to generate (Superuser only)
regenerateCharts.weeksToGenerateDescription: Enter the number of weeks in the past to generate charts for (1-52)
regenerateCharts.alreadyInProgress: Chart generation is already in progress. Please wait for it to complete.

loadingMessages.interestingTastes: This group sure has some interesting tastes...
loadingMessages.unexpectedArtist: Oh wow, THAT artist got #1? Interesting...
loadingMessages.oldTrack: Now that's a track that I hadn't heard in a while...
loadingMessages.deepCuts: Some real deep cuts in here, I see...
loadingMessages.albumLove: Wow, someone really loves that album...
loadingMessages.hiddenGems: Finding the hidden gems in your music taste...

userFetchErrors.title: Chart Generation Issues
userFetchErrors.failedUsers: Could not retrieve data for the following users:
userFetchErrors.abortedMessage: Chart generation was aborted because too many users' data failed to load from Last.fm. Please try again later.
userFetchErrors.partialSuccessMessage: Charts were generated successfully, but some users could not be included.
userFetchErrors.contributionsMissed: Note: The contributions from these users will be missed in the last week's charts. If this is not a permanent issue (e.g., there's a temporary Last.fm outage), you can try regenerating the charts again later from the group settings page.
userFetchErrors.lastfmOutageTip: If you cannot access Last.fm's website normally, this suggests a temporary outage. Please try again later when Last.fm's status has normalized.

shoutbox.title: Shoutbox Settings
shoutbox.enableShoutboxDescription: When disabled, the shoutbox will be hidden from the group page. Existing comments are preserved.
shoutbox.restrictiveModeDescription: When enabled, only users explicitly added to the allowed list can post comments. By default, all members can post.
shoutbox.silencedUsersDescription: Users who are silenced cannot post comments in this group.
shoutbox.allowedUsersDescription: Users who are allowed to post comments in restrictive mode.

deleteGroup.description: Permanently delete this group and all associated data.
deleteGroup.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
deleteGroup.willDelete: Deleting this group will permanently remove:
deleteGroup.allMembers: All the contributions of the members to this group's charts

artistEntries.title: This Artist's Chart Entries
artistEntries.noTracks: No tracks by this artist have charted yet.
artistEntries.noAlbums: No albums by this artist have charted yet.
artistEntries.name: Name

status.calculatingDescription: Please come back later to view the records.
status.canRetry: You can request a recalculation now.
status.waitToRetry: Please wait at least 1 hour since charts were generated before requesting again.
status.generateCharts: Generate charts to start building records!
status.noRecordsForCategory: No records available for this category yet.

chartRecords.artistMostSongsInTop10: Artist with Most Songs in Top 10
chartRecords.artistMostAlbumsInTop10: Artist with Most Albums in Top 10

userRecords.unlockMessage: This group currently has {count} {memberOrMembers}. Invite {inviteCount} to unlock member records!
userRecords.unlockDescription: With more people, we can compare contributions and highlight who's bringing the most energy, plays, and taste to the group.
userRecords.memberAwardsFAQLink: To learn more about how member awards are given, <link>check the FAQ page</link> ‚Üí

awardDescriptions.vsVirtuoso: The member who contributed the most total Vibe Score (VS) to this group's charts. They're the life of the group.
awardDescriptions.playPowerhouse: This is the member with the most total plays across all their contributions. They really love scrobbling.
awardDescriptions.chartConnoisseur: This member helped the most different entries make it onto the charts. They have broad taste.
awardDescriptions.hiddenGemHunter: The member who helped the fewest entries chart. They keep it niche and curated.
awardDescriptions.consistencyChampion: The member who contributed to charts for the most weeks. They show up every time.
awardDescriptions.tasteMaker: This is the member who introduced the most entries that later became #1 hits. They have that magic touch.

detail.noEntries: No entries found for this record type.
detail.error: Failed to load entries. Please try again later.

landing.subtitle: Create music communities with your friends and build a shared listening history
landing.description: Discover what's most popular in the group, create weekly charts that represent your current favorites, and track the evolution of your collective music taste.

createGroups.title: Music Communities
createGroups.description: Create a group with friends and combine your listening habits. See what everyone is listening to, discover the group's favorites, and build a music history collectively.

statsTrends.title: Statistics and Trends
statsTrends.description: Watch your favorite artists climb the charts, discover what's trending in your circles, and explore the evolution of trends over time.

shareTaste.title: Share Your Taste
shareTaste.description: See how your music taste compares with others, discover who your musical match is, and what makes your way of listening unique.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Connect your Last.fm account and start building shared listening histories with your friends.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordNoSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address.
verifyEmail.successDescription: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
verifyEmail.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a verification email to your address. Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
verifyEmail.linkExpires: The verification link will expire in 24 hours.
verifyEmail.didntReceive: Didn't receive the email? We can send another one.
verifyEmail.needNewEmail: Need a new verification email? Enter your email address below.
verifyEmail.emailSent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.

errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before signing in.
errors.invalidToken: Invalid or expired verification token. Please request a new one.
errors.serverError: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.verifyFailed: An error occurred while verifying your email. Please try again.

verification.subject: Verify your ChartsFM account
verification.title: Welcome to ChartsFM!
verification.body: Thank you for signing up! To complete your account setup, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
verification.orCopyPaste: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expires: This link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your ChartsFM password
passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password:
passwordReset.orCopyPaste: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.expires: This link will expire in 1 hour. If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

site.description: Create and share music charts with friends. Generate weekly charts from Last.fm listening data, join groups with friends and discover music trends together.
site.name: ChartsFM
